title: School as a resource unit (TEFC)
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Open University and Edward Milner
brief_description: A case study of a resource-centred junior school. Children and staff of a British school are seen in normal school activities, many of which involve the use of multi-media material from the school resource centre.
description: A case study of a resource-centred junior school. Children and staff of a British school are seen in normal school activities, many of which involve the use of multi-media material from the school resource centre.
